trans-unit.source: Represents a thumbnail image of a document sequence, single document, or single page.
trans-unit.target: 代表文件順序、 單一文件或單一頁面的縮圖影像。

trans-unit.source: The XpsThumbnail class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsThumbnail 類別有沒有公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an XpsThumbnail is provided through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: 透過所提供的參考 XpsThumbnail <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that if any page in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> has a thumbnail, that all pages be specified with thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議如果任何頁面<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>具有縮圖，縮圖使用指定的所有頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>
